# Metodologia




## 

```{r,echo=F,message=F}
library(ggplot2)
#library(cowplot)
ggplot(unanimidade,aes(x=ano,y=percentual,group=unanime,color=orgao_julgador)) +
  geom_line()+
  #facet_wrap(~)
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle=45,size=5)
  )

```


## Terceira Turma

A terceira

```{r,echo=F,message=F}
library(ggplot2)
#library(cowplot)
ggplot(una3,aes(x=ano,y=percentual,group=unanime,color=unanime)) +
  geom_line()+
  scale_color_discrete(name="Votação",labels=c("Maioria","Unânime"),guide=guide_legend(reverse=T))
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle=45)
  )

```
